title: Pyruvic acid vertabrate muscle cell, 5 options 2

content.prompt: Which of the following best accounts for the shape of the solid line between points A and D?

choices.label: After ten minutes the cellular enzymes became ineffective.
ATP acted as an allosteric inhibitor on one or more of the enzymes.
The measurements of pyruvic acid were unreliable.
The cells required more glucose than was being provided.

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
